title: data-visualizer
description: A lightweight library for creating interactive data visualizations. It provides a simple API for transforming complex datasets into insightful charts and graphs with minimal configuration.

title: react-component-library
description: A collection of reusable React components designed for modern web applications. It includes form elements, navigation components, modals, and more, all with accessibility and responsiveness in mind.

title: api-toolkit
description: A comprehensive toolkit for building and testing RESTful APIs. It includes middleware for authentication, rate limiting, and request validation, as well as utilities for documentation generation and testing.

title: ml-playground
description: An educational platform for experimenting with machine learning algorithms. It provides interactive visualizations and code examples to help users understand how different algorithms work and when to use them.
